On [[2 October]] [[1947]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to A.W. Riddle'''.<ref>{{CG|C}}, p. 323</ref><ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=72330|articlename=20th-Century Books and Manuscripts. 2002|dated=|website=TB|accessed=2 January 2012}}</ref>

*'''Subject:''' Grammar of the English language.
*'''Publication:''' Quotes from the letter appeared in ''[[Christie's 20th-Century Books and Manuscripts 6 December 2002]]''.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.christies.com/lotfinder/tolkien-john-ronald-reuel-autograph-letter/4036986/lot/lot_details.aspx?from=searchresults&intObjectID=4036986&sid=8c6108f0-14f6-4c1c-a674-fbedb9a79433|articlename=Sale 9489 Lot 26|dated=|website=[http://www.christies.com/ Christie's]|accessed=2 January 2012}}</ref>
